<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magic Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=1700) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Healing Hands](/Feats.aspx?ID=267)

</column>

---

The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, making your mundane healing work as if by magic. When you succeed at a [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check to [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57), your action gains the [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) trait and you heal the maximum amount for the 2d8 (or 4d8 on a critical success). If you have an ability that adds additional dice to your Treat Wounds, you still roll those normally.
name: Magic Hands
